title: output.load_served.schema
description: Statistics about the load served, in percent, either by the Grid (feeder), or by the microgrids

Feeder load (%).description: The percent of load served by the feeder (grid)

Feeder customers (%).description: The percent of customers served by the feeder (grid)

Total load (%).description: The percent of total load served by any resource

Total customers (%).description: The percent of total customers served by any resource

Microgrid load (%).description: The percent of load served by the microgrids

Microgrid customers (%).description: The percent of customers served by the microgrids

Bonus load via microgrid (%).description: The percent of additional load that microgrids are supporting outside of their predefined microgrid zones

Bonus customers via microgrid (%).description: The percent of additional customers that microgrids are supporting outside of their predefined microgrid zones
